articles.title: Brett James: 'Jesus, Take the Wheel' songwriter dies in plane crash in North Carolina - BBC
articles.description: Friends and co-artists remember the Grammy-winning writer as "a songwriting force of nature".
articles.content:
Grammy-winning songwriter Brett James, best known for co-writing the 2005 hit song Jesus Take the Wheel, has died in a plane crash in North Carolina.
James, 57, was one of the three people aboard a … [+1846 chars]

articles.title: I Can’t Believe That NBC Let Jordan Peele Make This Movie - Slate
articles.description: The new horror satire of the NFL sure doesn’t pull any punches.
articles.content:

articles.title: Body Discovered Inside Singer D4vd’s Tesla Identified as Teen Missing for Over a Year - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Celeste Rivas had been missing for nearly 18 months before her remains were found at Hollywood Tow on Sept. 8. Since the remains were identified, the singer's tour has been canceled.
articles.content: The severely decomposing body discovered at a Los Angeles impound lot inside a Tesla, which was found to be registered to up-and-coming singer D4vd, has been identified as a missing Inland Empire tee… [+3415 chars]
